name: Cave Chess
description:
Chess For Cave-People! Grab your roommate, partner, sibling, etc, because this is a 2 player game! There is an AI opponent, but it is very basic (and may be a little buggy).

Controls: Left-click to select, right-click to cancel

Rules: On the first turn, each player places 4 units on their side of the board (you can pick as many of each type as you like). Every turn after that, each player gets 3 actions (move or attack) per turn. The game is over when one player runs out of units.

Units:

  • Bison (well-rounded)
    • 3 HP, 2 ATK
    • Move in any direction (2 squares)
    • Attack diagonally (1 square)
  • Mammoth (tank)
    • 5 HP, 1 ATK
    • Move up/down, left/right (1 square)
    • Attack in any direction (1 square)
  • Warrior (ranged)
    • 1 HP, 3 ATK
    • Move diagonally (1 square)
    • Attack left/right (3 squares)

Music Credit: Rain by Stellarmusic https://www.jamendo.com/track/1143621/rain

Known Issues: It is possible to "box in" a player's units by blocking all of their movement options. If all of a (non-cpu) player's units are blocked from moving, and cannot attack, then the game is stuck and must be reset
